client.name: client
client.description: Set client that you want to build app

target.name: target
target.description: Set the build target: android, ios or both

env.name: env
env.description: Set the environment: prod, adhoc, staging

branch.name: branch
branch.description: Set the source branch used to build the app

version.name: version
version.description: Set the version number for this build

installr.name: installr
installr.description: If enabled, the build will be uploaded to installR

examples:
$ rnbuilder codepush
    Push changes to existing apps ./src/firebase-sync-udids.ts!

client.name: client
client.description: Select client that you want to push update

initialize.description: Initialize the environment for first run
examples:
$ rnbuilder initialize
initialize environment for first run from ./src/initialize.ts!

$ rnbuilder sync-udids
    Sync device UDIDs from firebase from ./src/firebase-sync-udids.ts!

client.name: client
client.description: Select client that you want to sync udids
